Articles.Content: When you're about to crash and jebs just like...
He's gangsta.

Jebediah Kerman is officially BadS. It's in the configuration file.

You can still scare him though. I suggest deliberately making bits of his rocket explode, he doesn't much like that.
I've found that unless he is actively in the process of dying, Jeb's not fazed by much.
Yeah, that's Jeb for you. He doesn't always like it when parts of his spaceship break, as he's not a complete loon, but pretty wild.
I'm fairly sure that Jeb's dislike of his rocket falling apart stems more from a feeling of "aww man now I can't fly anmore" rather than a feeling of "omg omg I'm gonna die"

I'm fairly sure that Jeb's dislike of his rocket falling apart stems more from a feeling of "aww man now I can't fly anmore" rather than a feeling of "omg omg I'm gonna die"

Correct.

I recently had a crash with Jeb. He crashed his ship, and that crashed the game.

5 minutes later he turns up at the astronaut complex like nothing happened...
Jeb sure loves his job!
He likes explosions...which explains why he's always smiling when flying my crafts

Jeb sure loves his job!

http://cloud-2.steampowered.com/ugc/579019461644924843/24D0E2DFC0F998AB979953B2481F17A95991A468/

He looks like he's smuggling drugs in that picture...

Last I heard, he's immortal. Reappears in the Astronaut Complex. This may have been changed though.

I can imagine that his show of fear is due to the impact before death being considerably painful. XD

He looks like he's smuggling drugs in that picture...

Now I know where ISIS got all that blow from.
I think all your Kerbals will respawn at the complex after death, unless you turn that off in your save.
With Jeb, everything's a rollercoaster. I'm amazed he doesn't throw his arms up in the air when the chute fails to open.
Now thinking of adding EVA parachutes and seeing if I can pull off a re-entry without a ship. I expect to see Jeb grinning from ear to ear
I've scared him with a Minmus -> Kerbin direct straight down re-entry
I'm pretty sure Jebediah Kerman was the personality that the Space Core from Portal 2 was based off of. Even though Portal 2 technically predates KSP.
Jebidiah is the one Kerbal who's proficient at litho-braking - aka survive slamming into the mun at 70 m/s because you started your suicide burn too late.
Hell, a friend decided to try doing an EVA at about 15,000 meters the other day, he bounced once and survived!
I know this slightly off subject but, I had Bill piloting a munar mission a couple of days ago and just after the orbital transfer,,, he smiled!

Now thinking of adding EVA parachutes and seeing if I can pull off a re-entry without a ship. I expect to see Jeb grinning from ear to ear

You can try adding a radial parachute and an external command seat to a probe body. Pretty sure Jeb will love it
I made him frown when I hit the water nose first at mach 2 just seconds before death.
